chart.description: For analog datatags, a DAQ filters out all values that land out of the min-max range. This chart displays the tags with the highest number of updates filtered out due to this bound. A high value may indicate that the range used was inappropriate, or that the equipment is defective. The values given below are for the last 7 days (note: for the out-of-bounds values send to the AS, this chart currently only takes into account those that are only marked as out-of-bounds, without any additional quality flag attached).
chart.title: Top out-of-bounds tags
